name: SpaceClash (Skillerabren)
description:
Hello and welcome to SpaceClash!
I am working on this game since summer 2020! SpaceClash will be a 2D-4-Player-Brawl-And-Place-Traps-Party-Game, taking place on a spaceship  (inspired by Brawlhalla, Gangbeasts, Ultimate Chicken Horse and some more).

By now, the game contains
- some default levels
- a level editor and
- up to 4 player local multiplayer!

Hint: Go to the settings>keybinds to look up and change controls

(More info as development continues)

For more indepth changelogs/updates and help if you have issues:
Join my discord community:  SkillerabrenStudios
